授業目的: The main purpose of all my literature courses is to enable students to familiarize authentic literary texts in English. For this purpose, interesting fantasy stories written for juvenile readers are selected, so that you can read a whole book enjoyably without so much difficulties. This course (and the course C), focuses primarily on substantial reading. You will read a longer book (400 pages or more) and discuss the story extensively with other students. In short, the course will provide you with a lot of interesting reading and discussing opportunities.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to read a whole fantasy story for juvenile readers written in authentic English and understand the benefits of doing it.
2. You will be able to discuss what you have read with connecting your own thoughts and experiences.
3. You will be able to interpret the meaning of story with connecting the reality and yourself and express it in essays.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
- For students permitted to take classes online: You will take within zoom sessions.
- Reading, students' presentations, and discussions are main activities in the course.
